definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: At the time of purchase to the floor, at least to moderate more.
sentences.chinese: 所以在购买地板砖时，起码要中档以上的。

sentences.english: Floor tile high prices are on the hundred dollars, the lowest of only a few dollars a piece.
sentences.chinese: 地板砖价高的有上百元，价低的只有几元一块。

sentences.english: Toilets are neat and clean , that flushes are working and no leaking and floor tiles are in good order.
sentences.chinese: 整洁干净，冲洗设备工作无漏泄，地板砖状况良好。

sentences.english: So when buying floor tile, at least to mid-range or more.
sentences.chinese: 所以在购买地板砖时，起码要中档以上的。

sentences.english: we love the black &white floor tiles in our kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜爱厨房间里黑白相间的地板砖。

definition: to point a brick wall/to grout a tiled surface
cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
